body_html:
@luto65 looking at the backtracke and source a little, it seems like "features" in _evaluate_mode is turning out to be None. That comes from a call to _get_features_and_labels_from_input_fn.

So if you wouldn't mind a little bit of Python debugging, can you please check that the input_fun you're passing in is sane?

body:
@luto65 looking at the backtracke and source a little, it seems like "features" in _evaluate_mode is turning out to be None. That comes from a call to _get_features_and_labels_from_input_fn. 

So if you wouldn't mind a little bit of Python debugging, can you please check that the input_fun you're passing in is sane?
